title: LEAGUE I'M SO DONE
body: So I literally can't play league anymore because I lag out every game. like 3000 ping all the time. I love this game I've been playing for years but I can't deal with this. It's only league. I can play any other online game without lag, but i wanna play league. it's not fair to me. Please tell me you're working on this. or help me figure out whats wrong because I love this game and have put over $200 and thousands of hours into.

replies.body:
Huge changes in latency are usually caused by either local network issues or issues along your network routing to our servers. I'd like you to work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local configurations are up to spec before we take a look at your routing.

Let me know if this caused any change in your latency.
